newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse to merge two departments.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse to merge two departments.

text.p: Micro Warehouse Inc said on Tuesday that it would merge its purchasing and marketing organizations to create four new merchandising units under a major reorganization plan.

"This organization will help Micro Warehouse concentrate its marketing and purchasing efforts cohesively on the growth and profitability of all product categories," said Micro's chief executive, Linwood Lacy.
Micro Warehouse said in November that it would restate its fiscal 1994 and 1995 results because of accounting errors and realign certain departments.
Micro Warehouse is a specialty catalog retailer and direct marketer of personal computers, computer sorfware and networking products.
